titleInfo.title: Supplementary material for "sc3nb: a Python-SuperCollider Interface for Auditory Data Science"

mods.abstract: This research data publication contains supplementary material that accompanies the publication "sc3nb: a Python-SuperCollider Interface for Auditory Data Science". As the sc3nb code is public and available via http://github.com/interactive-sonification/sc3nb, we here provide only specific audio files and code examples, i.e. a Jupyter notebook.
